2001 NBA Playoffs Summary

2000 Playoffs Summary 2002 Playoffs Summary

League Champion: Los Angeles Lakers

Finals MVP: Shaquille O'Neal (33.0 / 15.8 / 4.8)


2001 Playoff Leaders:

PTS: Allen Iverson (723)

TRB: Dikembe Mutombo (316)

AST: Allen Iverson (134)

WS: Kobe Bryant (3.8)
